nodes.text: The DX-2 Dominator Droid was a battle droid used by the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY the droid, along with TZ-3 Dominator Droid and C2-N Dominator Droid was used to defend the approach to the Bastion in the Coronet City on Corellia, but was destroyed during the assault by the Galactic Republic forces.

DX-2 Dominator Droid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Trooper class mission on Corellia. The droid appears in one of three possible approach routes and, depending on the player's choices, can be destroyed by the Fifty-third Armored Platoon, the Eighty-first Infantry or by Havoc Squad.
